issues.issue: OEL201 Create an Aha epic in [bigblue.aha.io](https://bigblue.aha.io) following the instructions provided.
OEL202 Attend 'Cloud Platform Onboarding Sprint SME Weekly' calls with Service Framework requirement questions, as needed.
OEL203 Identify costs, establish Pricing & choose pre-approved metrics for consumption billing.
OEL204 Update miniSD when adding new metrics, using Emptoris process/tool and receive Legal approval. Otherwise, no action required.
OEL205 Create new parts with Brand New Product Manager (BNPM) to prepare for completion of part coding spreadsheet.
OEL206 Re-Load Pricing Tables into WWPRT.
OEL209 Work with your Sales Enablement (SE) Lead to receive approval of GTM material updates, if required by them.

OEL210 Engage with your Team's Communication Approver/Publisher to establish and create appropriate communications. If there is a pricing change with the addition of the plan, engage with [Leah Forester](mailto:Leah%20%Forester/US/IBM) to create eNurture.
